lines.text: Cops were dying all over the place and all I could do was act like a woman. I knew my days as a cop were over.

For five years I had been a cop, putting criminals behind bars. And now I was behind bars myself. Caged alongside the same petty trash and scum that I had helped put away. I knew a lot of brutality and perversion was going on in those cells but I didn't care. I had my own problems.
I saw your girlfriend french kissing a donkey on the reservation.
I've been knocked down and insulted. I'm hot and dirty. I'm calling it a day.
Mrs. Pusker was straight out of some low budget prison movie. But this wasn't a movie... this was real.
When I came to I was sopping wet and nauseous.
They had screwed up my mind so that I couldn't think. Thanks to my police training they hadn't screwed up my body... yet.
Meanwhile, the goings on at the prison were getting worse.
Maxwell's idea of a porno movie was sicker than anything anyone could imagine.
Shut up, you yellow belly hippie! Do as I told you!
